summary: An ordinance relating to zoning and providing for the rezoning of Block 2, Gilmore's Addition, Blocks 7 to 24, inclusive, Evergreen Addition, and the unplatted portion of the Northwest one-quarter of Section 11, Township 25 North, Range 4 East, W. M., lying between the south line of Block 2, Gilmore's Addition, the west line of Evergreen Addition, the north line and north line produced west of Block 5, Hebb's Avion City Addition, and a line formed by the east line of Blocks 1, 3 and Lot 1, Block 4, Hebb's Avion City Addition, and the east line of 60th Avenue Northeast, with respect to Use and Area Districts, and amending Ordinance No. 45382, as amended, by adding thereto two new sections numbered 2-69 and 17-43, respectively.
